verses.name: 1 Samuel 30:4
verses.text: Then David and the people that were with him lifted up their voice and wept, until they had no more power to weep.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 30:5
verses.text: And David’s two wives were taken captives, Ahinoam the Jezreelitess, and Abigail the wife of Nabal the Carmelite.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 30:6
verses.text: And David was greatly distressed; for the people spake of stoning him, because the soul of all the people was grieved, every man for his sons and for his daughters: but David encouraged himself in the Lord his God.
